hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' | { read file_path; if echo "$file_path" | grep -q '\.py$'; then ruff check "$file_path" --fix --quiet 2>/dev/null; ruff format "$file_path" --quiet 2>/dev/null; fi; }

jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' | { read fp; case "$fp" in */interpreter.py|*/expressions.py) echo '{"feedback": "⚠️ CORE FILE. Read the entire file first. Explain what you are changing and why."}' ;; esac; }
